displayName.japanese: スピードランナー I

description.english: Beat 'The Eight Pages' level in under 5 minutes
description.german: Schließe Level
description.french: Terminez le niveau 'Les huit pages' en moins de 5 minutes
description.italian: Completa il livello Le otto pagine in meno di 5 minuti
description.spanish: Supera el nivel "Las ocho páginas" en menos de 5 minutos
description.schinese: 在5分钟内通过关卡“八页纸”
description.tchinese: 在 5 分鐘內通過『八頁』關卡
description.russian: Пройдите уровень «Восемь страниц» менее чем за 5 минут.
description.japanese: 「8枚のページ」レベルを5分以内にクリアする
description.portuguese: Termina o nível 'As Oito Páginas' em menos de 5 minutos

displayName.japanese: スピードランナー II

description.english: Beat the 'Into The Abyss' level in under 5 minutes
description.german: Schließe Level
description.french: Terminez le niveau 'Dans les abysses' en moins de 5 minutes
description.italian: Completa il livello Nell'abisso in meno di 5 minuti
description.spanish: Supera el nivel "Hacia el abismo" en menos de 5 minutos
description.schinese: 在5分钟内通过关卡“进入深渊”
description.tchinese: 在 5 分鐘內通過『進入深淵』關卡
description.russian: Пройдите уровень «В бездну» менее чем за 5 минут.
description.japanese: 「深淵へ」レベルを5分以内にクリアする
description.portuguese: Termina o nível 'Entrando no Abismo' em menos de 5 minutos

displayName.japanese: スピードランナー III

description.english: Beat the game in under 45 minutes
description.german: Schließe das Spiel in unter 45 Minuten ab
description.french: Terminez le jeu en moins de 45 minutes
description.italian: Completa il gioco in meno di 45 minuti
description.spanish: Supera el juego en menos de 45 minutos
description.tchinese: 在 45 分鐘內通關遊戲
description.russian: Пройдите игру менее чем за 45 минут.
description.japanese: ゲームを45分以内にクリアする
description.portuguese: Termina o jogo em menos de 45 minutos

description.english: Find all numbered letters
description.german: Finde alle nummerierten Briefe
description.french: Trouvez toutes les lettres numérotées
description.italian: Trova tutte le lettere numerate
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las cartas numeradas
description.tchinese: 找到全部有數字編號的信件
description.russian: Найдите все пронумерованные письма.
description.japanese: 番号が付いた手紙を全部見つける
description.portuguese: Encontra todas as cartas numeradas

description.english: Find all scrapbook items
description.german: Finde alle Gegenstände fürs Erinnerungsalbum
description.french: Trouvez tous les objets de l'album
description.italian: Trova tutti gli oggetti per l'album di ritagli
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los objetos del álbum de recortes
description.tchinese: 找到全部的剪貼簿物品
description.russian: Найдите все предметы для альбома.
description.japanese: スクラップブックのアイテムを全部見つける
description.portuguese: Encontra todos os itens do álbum

description.english: Riding a Slide in a Horror Game
description.german: Nutzen einer Rutsche in einem Horrorspiel
description.french: Vous avez fait du toboggan dans un jeu d'horreur
description.italian: Usare uno scivolo in un gioco horror... davvero?
description.spanish: Súbete a un tobogán en un juego de terror
description.tchinese: 在恐怖遊戲中溜滑梯
description.russian: Прокатитесь с горки в игре-ужастике.
description.japanese: ホラーゲームですべり台に乗る
description.portuguese: Andar no escorrega num jogo de terror

description.english: Exceed 10 failed pause attempts
description.german: Überschreite mehr als 10 fehlgeschlagene Pause-Versuche
description.french: Vous n'avez pas réussi à mettre le jeu en pause plus de 10 fois
description.italian: Cerca di mettere in pausa e fallisci per almeno 10 volte
description.spanish: Supera 10 intentos fallidos de pausa
description.tchinese: 暫停失敗超過 10 次
description.russian: Безуспешно попытайтесь поставить игру на паузу более 10 раз.
description.japanese: 失敗した一時停止回数が10回を超える
description.portuguese: Faz mais de 10 tentativas de pausa malsucedidas

displayName.english: Why Am I Still Playing This Game?
displayName.german: Warum spiele ich dieses Spiel immer noch?
displayName.french: Pourquoi est-ce que je m'inflige ça ?
displayName.spanish: ¿Por qué sigo jugando a este juego?
displayName.schinese: 我为什么还在玩这游戏？
displayName.tchinese: 我為什麼還在玩這遊戲？
displayName.japanese: どうしてまだこのゲームをプレイしてるの？
displayName.portuguese: Porque é que ainda estou a jogar isto?

description.english: Exceed 50 failed pause attempts
description.german: Überschreite mehr als 50 fehlgeschlagene Pause-Versuche
description.french: Vous n'avez pas réussi à mettre le jeu en pause plus de 50 fois
description.italian: Cerca di mettere in pausa e fallisci per almeno 50 volte
description.spanish: Supera 50 intentos fallidos de pausa
description.tchinese: 暫停失敗超過 50 次
description.russian: Безуспешно попытайтесь поставить игру на паузу более 50 раз.
description.japanese: 失敗した一時停止回数が50回を超える
description.portuguese: Faz mais de 50 tentativas de pausa malsucedidas

description.english: Escape any level and fall to your death/Slender grasp
description.german: Entkomme irgendeinem Level und stürze in den Tod/gerate in die Slender-Fänge
description.french: Échappez-vous de n'importe quel niveau et faites une chute mortelle/succombez au Slender Man
description.italian: Scappa da qualsiasi livello per poi morire o farti catturare dallo Slender Man
description.spanish: Escapa de cualquier nivel y cae en las manos de la muerte / a las garras de Slender
description.schinese: 逃离任意关卡并落入死亡/瘦长魔之手
description.tchinese: 逃脫任何關卡，然後摔死或被瘦長人抓住
description.russian: Спаситесь на любом уровне, только чтобы погибнуть или оказаться в лапах Слендера.
description.japanese: レベルを脱出し、死ぬか、スレンダーの手に落ちる
description.portuguese: Escapa de qualquer nível e morre de uma queda/de um agarrão do Slender

displayName.german: Na ja, wenigstens hast du es probiert

description.english: Die in the 'Into the Abyss' level 3 times in a row
description.german: Stirb im Level
description.french: Mourez 3 fois d'affilée dans le niveau 'Dans les abysses'
description.italian: Muori per 3 volte di fila nel livello Nell'abisso
description.spanish: Muere en el nivel de "Hacia el abismo" 3 veces seguidas
description.schinese: 在关卡“进入深渊”连续死亡3次
description.tchinese: 在『進入深淵』關卡連續死亡 3 次
description.russian: Умрите на уровне «В бездну» 3 раза подряд
description.japanese: 「深淵へ」レベルで3回連続死ぬ
description.portuguese: Morre 3 vezes seguidas no nível 'Entrando no Abismo'

description.english: Listen to all of the radio tracks in the house
description.german: Hör dir alle Radioaufzeichnungen im Haus an
description.french: Écoutez toutes les pistes de la radio dans la maison
description.italian: Ascolta tutte le tracce radiofoniche in casa
description.spanish: Escucha todas las pistas de radio de la casa
description.schinese: 听遍房子里所有电台歌曲
description.tchinese: 聆聽房屋內全部的無線電訊息
description.russian: Послушайте все песни на радио в доме.
description.japanese: 家の中でラジオの曲を全部聴く
description.portuguese: Ouve todas as faixas de rádio na casa

description.english: Play the piano until the first notes from "No Friends" is played
description.german: Spiele das Piano bis die erste Note von "No Friends" gespielt wird
description.french: Jouez du piano jusqu'à entendre les premières notes de"No Friends"
description.italian: Suona il pianoforte finché non vengono riprodotte le prime note di Senza amici
description.spanish: Toca el piano hasta que se reproduzcan las primeras notas de "No Friends"
description.schinese: 一直弹钢琴直到弹出"没朋友"的头几个音符
description.tchinese: 彈奏鋼琴，直到彈奏出『沒有朋友』的第一個音符
description.russian: Играйте на пианино, пока не прозвучат первые ноты песни No Friends.
description.japanese: 「No Friends」の最初の音が鳴るまで、ピアノを弾く
description.portuguese: Toca piano até tocares as primeiras notas da música "No Friends"

description.english: Get ensnared by Slender Man’s tentacles
description.german: Werde von Slender Mans Tentakeln gefangen
description.french: Faites en sorte que le Slender Man vous piège dans ses tentacules
description.italian: Fatti intrappolare dai tentacoli dello Slender Man
description.spanish: Deja que los tentáculos de Slender Man te atrapen
description.tchinese: 被瘦長人的觸角抓住
description.russian: Попадитесь в щупальца Слендера.
description.japanese: スレンダーマンの触手にとらえられる
description.portuguese: Sê entrelaçado pelos tentáculos do Slender Man

description.english: Disrupt Charlie while he's crying at least 3 times
description.german: Störe Charlie mindestens 3-mal während er weint
description.french: Interrompez Charlie pendant qu'il pleure au moins 3 fois
description.italian: Interrompi Charlie mentre sta piangendo per almeno 3 volte
description.spanish: Interrumpe a Charlie mientras llora al menos 3 veces
description.tchinese: 在查理哭泣時干擾對方至少 3 次
description.russian: Помешайте Чарли плакать хотя бы 3 раза.
description.japanese: 3回以上、チャーリーが泣いている間に妨害する
description.portuguese: Interrompe o Charlie pelo menos 3 vezes enquanto ele chora

description.english: Beat the Genesis level on "Hardcore" difficulty
description.german: Schließe das Level Genesis auf Schwierigkeitsgrad "Hardcore" ab
description.french: Terminez le niveau 'Genèse' en difficulté"Hardcore"
description.italian: Completa il livello Genesi a livello di difficoltà Molto difficile
description.spanish: Supera el nivel "Génesis" en dificultad "Difícil"
description.schinese: 以"硬核"难度通过关卡“起源”
description.tchinese: 通關『困難』難度的創世紀關卡
description.russian: Пройдите уровень «Происхождение» на очень высокой сложности.
description.japanese: 難易度「ハードコア」で「ジェネシス」レベルをクリアする
description.portuguese: Termina o nível 'Génese' na dificuldade "Hardcore"

description.english: Beat the game on normal difficulty
description.german: Schließe das Spiel auf Schwierigkeitsgrad Normal ab
description.french: Terminez le jeu en difficulté normale
description.italian: Completa il gioco a livello di difficoltà Normale
description.spanish: Supera el juego en dificultad normal
description.tchinese: 通關普通難度的遊戲
description.russian: Пройдите игру на средней сложности.
description.japanese: 難易度「ノーマル」でゲームをクリアする
description.portuguese: Termina o jogo na dificuldade normal

description.english: Beat the game on "Hardcore" difficulty
description.german: Schließe das Spiel auf Schwierigkeitsgrad "Hardcore" ab
description.french: Terminez le jeu en difficulté"Hardcore"
description.italian: Completa il gioco a livello di difficoltà Molto difficile
description.spanish: Supera el juego en dificultad "Difícil"
description.tchinese: 通關『極限』難度的遊戲
description.russian: Пройдите игру на очень высокой сложности.
description.japanese: 難易度「ハードコア」でゲームをクリアする
description.portuguese: Termina o jogo na dificuldade "Hardcore"

description.english: Make it through the forest fire without catching on fire once
description.german: Schaffe es durch den Waldbrand ohne auch nur einmal Feuer zu fangen
description.french: Traversez le feu de forêt sans jamais prendre feu
description.italian: Scampa all'incendio nella foresta senza mai prendere fuoco
description.spanish: Atraviesa el incendio forestal sin prenderte fuego ni una sola vez
description.schinese: 逃离森林大火，一次都不被火烧伤
description.tchinese: 在從頭到尾不著火的情況下，穿越燃燒的樹林
description.russian: Пройдите через лесной пожар, ни разу не загоревшись.
description.japanese: 一度も火が付かずに、山火事をくぐりぬける
description.portuguese: Atravessa o incêndio da floresta sem pegares fogo uma única vez

description.english: Surpass 10 000 total steps taken
description.german: Laufe mehr als insgesamt 10.000 Schritte
description.french: Effectuez plus de 10 000 pas
description.italian: Percorri almeno 10.000 passi
description.spanish: Supera los 10 000 pasos en total
description.tchinese: 總步數超過 10,000 步
description.russian: Сделайте более 10 000 шагов.
description.japanese: 合計歩数が1万歩を超える
description.portuguese: Dá mais de 10.000 passos

description.english: We're sorry about that... Here's a cookie!
description.german: Tut uns leid … Hier hast du einen Keks!
description.french: Nous sommes désolés pour ça… Voilà un cookie pour nous faire pardonner !
description.italian: Ci dispiace... Ecco un biscotto!
description.spanish: Lo sentimos... ¡Toma una galleta!
description.schinese: 我们对此很遗憾……来块饼干吧！
description.tchinese: 很抱歉…賞你個餅乾！
description.russian: Нам очень жаль... Возьмите печеньку!
description.japanese: お悔やみ申し上げます...クッキーがありますよ！
description.portuguese: Lamentamos por isso... Aqui vai um biscoito!

displayName.german: Ich … Ich werde das … einfach nehmen … okay?
displayName.spanish: Yo... Solo voy a... coger esto... ¿creo?
displayName.japanese: こ...これ...これをもらう..ね？
displayName.portuguese: Acho que... vou apenas... pegar nisto?

description.english: Pick up an oversized sign and somehow manage to fit it in your scrapbook
description.german: Hebe ein überdimensioniertes Schild auf und lege es irgendwie in dein Erinnerungsalbum
description.french: Ramassez un panneau géant et réussissez contre toute attente à le faire rentrer dans votre album
description.italian: Prendi un cartello stradale molto grande e trova un modo per inserirlo nell'album di ritagli
description.spanish: Coge un cartel de gran tamaño y arréglatelas para que quepa en tu álbum de recortes
description.schinese: 拿起一个超大的牌子并想办法放进剪贴簿里
description.tchinese: 拿起超巨大招牌，想辦法把它塞進你的剪貼簿裡面
description.russian: Поднимите огромный знак и уместите его в свой альбом.
description.japanese: 非常に大きな看板を拾い、なんとかスクラップブックに貼り付ける
description.portuguese: Pega num placar grande e faz com que caiba no teu álbum
